p: Mexico and the United States of America were the first two countries to report the occurrence of the novel A(H1N1)pdm09 virus in April 2009 [ 1, 2]. Since then and in the following years, the A(H1N1)pdm09 virus has been associated to annual epidemics and it is actually identified as a seasonal virus together with influenza A(H3N2) and influenza type B virus.
